TopicSection.Content:
Sometimes you may want to analyze and view trends in the data. Sparklines are the best option for such analysis.

Sparkline are miniature charts thats fits into a single cell. You can add several sparklines in a single Grid because of its compact nature.

There are different types of Sparklines, for example: Line, Column, and Win/Loss etc.

We have shown sales trend of Apple products in the following image:

To use the sparkline, you need to add the following file references into your web page:
